journal-title-group.journal-title: The Journal of English and Germanic Philology

title-group.article-title: The Parable of Caedmon's "Hymn": Liturgical Invention and Literary Tradition

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2007 Board of Trustees of the University of Illinois
